text: Doru Tureanu (11 January 1954 â€“ 11 March 2014) was a Romanian ice hockey player who competed for Romania at the 1976 Winter Olympics and 1980 Winter Olympics. In 2011, he became just the second Romanian player to be inducted into the IIHF Hall of Fame.IIHF ==Career statistics== ===International=== Year Team Comp GP G A Pts PIM 1976 Romania Olympic 6 6 6 12 23 1980 Romania Olympic 5 5 2 7 8 Olympic Totals 11 11 8 19 31 ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Competitors at the 1976 Winter Olympics Category:Romanian ice hockey players Category:Ice hockey centres
